title: Facebook crashes for third time
text:
Facebook goes offline for third time in a month Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Facebook goes offline for third time in a month Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Down ... Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg has not commented on the recent outages. Picture: Paul Sakuma 
POPULAR social networking website Facebook went down for the third time in a month. 
It was first reported at around 5.03 am EST, but was back online for most users around 6am. 
No official reason was given when Facebook previously went offline on September 17 and September 24. Other Stories
